column5: Can't wait until spring is here...just ordered a couple of these....never owned a pflueger before...but I've heard good things about them.  http://www.pfluegerfishing.com/products/products.php?p=9  Can't go wrong for a magnesium 9 bearing reel for $82.00US from ebay.  Jason
I have never owned a pflueger either but they look nice have fun with them.
